text: Question - Is it possible to use HubL to get text from a module that is added to the page via the drag and drop? For example, I have a header module and want to essentially echo out the text the user enters there in another area.  Normally,it would be something like `widget_data.a-custom-module.value` can you accomplish this without the custom module? Something like `widget_data.14740526508376562.value` where the number is the id number generated for that module

So in case anyone is wondering you would do the following: `{{ all_widgets[1].params.value }}` only issue would be if they decided to move that module around, then it really wouldnt be in the [1] slot anymore.
Yea, its pulled from the JSON in the develop tools view
<@U2H3TT8F2|ajlaporte> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/ajlaporte/F2J41SD6C/pasted_image_at_2016_09_30_01_21_pm.png|Pasted image at 2016-09-30, 1:21 PM>
thats what I was going to suggest when I first started reading. put the content in there like #$@%@#$%@#$% and then search teh dev tools view for that string and reverse it
you could use either the `header_tag` or `label` if you wanted to narrow it down
